content: i designed this beautiful and simple toque for the lovely people in my beginner crochet class they did such a great job that i was asked to come back pattern is written for sizes 6-12 mth toddler child teen/sm adult med adult and lrg adult for my sample i used estelle yarns worsted in heather linen materials needed 5 5 mm i crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge approx 100-200 yards of #4 ww yarn darning needle soft measuring tape scissors 2 x stitch markers pom pom optional due to the nature of pdf s i do not offer refunds however i do support all of my designs all of my patterns have been tested by several crocheters/knitters of different experience levels please feel free to join my new online facebook community https //www facebook com/groups/264623622311939/ pattern discounts purchase 3 patterns 15% off using code **save15** purchase 5 patterns 25% off using code **save25** purchase 10 patterns 40% off using code **save40** i love to see your makes please consider tagging me on social media www facebook com/tiedupinknotscanadian or www instagram com/tiedupinknots designs or add them to the project page here on ravelry so that i may admire and share your makes all photographs design and written pattern contained here in are the sole property of ©nicole kliner designs aka tied up in knots designs you may not alter copy or sell any part of this pdf you may however sell your finished items i would love if you gave credit to me as the designer
